title: What are some good indie bands? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's a few to get you started, and how to find your new favorite Indy bands. Trudy and the romance are Beatles pretty cool Bright eyes, bob Dylan esque Neutral milk hotel is a personal favorite (Engine link at bottom of page) listen to their album (aeroplane over the sea) from start to finish because all of the songs flow together beautifully Shady Graves has become immensely popular as a one man band Colter wall has a Johnny cash cadence down pretty good A quick Google search can provide with you articles of indie chart toppers, new indie bands, and oldies but goodies. Looking for indie bands outside of the u.k, Canada, and u s.a is a great way to start! The Best Indie Bands & Artists Australian Indie Rock Bands List

The ShiversJeans WilderBOATHaley BonarThe BooksCanyonPinbackCayucasClinic Boyscout DiscoveryDucktailsFucked UpGenerationalsGentleman Jesse HaydenHer Space HolidayIslandsThe Killskissed her little sisterLEs Savy FavLittle JoyMenomenaMicachuThe NotwistPeter and The WolfPinback Point Juncture, WAASay HiNow, Now (FKA Now, Now MY Children)SimianSix Parts SevenSlintSonny and The SunsetsThe SPinto BandTame ImpalaThao Nyugen (Thao and The Getdown)The ThermalsThrow ME the StatueThe WalkmenWarpaintWavvesThe WoodsThe WrensYellow Ostrich Born Ruffians If you don't enjoy at least 5 bands on this list, you're dead inside..
